Class InputModulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • documentRetrieval.InputModulator
  • public class InputModulator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to process User input and is the Entry Point of the Application

    • Method Detail

      • setRankingScheme

        public static void setRankingScheme​(java.lang.String identifier)
                             throws documentRetrieval.InvalidInputException
        Custom Method used to set a flag which changes the ranking scheme Can Select VS or OK VS Specifies Vector Space ranking OK Specifies OKAPI Best-Match 25
        Parameters:
        identifier - a String to hold the runtime argument
        Throws:
        documentRetrieval.InvalidInputException - custom exception created earlier for input analysis

      • indexDirectoryCheck

        public static char indexDirectoryCheck()
        Custom Method for Checking and Handling the index Directory. User can Empty the existing index, Use it, or create a Directory if none Exists.
        Returns:
        char a character constant used further. avoids printing of the Exception stackTrace considering the asthetic appeal of the program Provides Options involving user interaction and has explicitly closed scanner objects to avoid resource leaks

      • indexCreator

        public static void indexCreator()
                         throws java.io.IOException
        The method which handles the indexCreation and indexes files. creates the objects of the Indexer Class with the index path mentioned
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOExceotion might be thrown by Indexer instance

      • searcher

        public static void searcher​(java.lang.String searchQueryEntered)
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            org.apache.lucene.queryparser.classic.ParseException
        The method which handles the search. creates the objects of the Searcher Class with the index path mentioned creates the instances of TopDocs ScoreDocs prints the Desired OutPut. Rank, RelavanceScore, FileName, FilePath, and Title if HTML File
        Parameters:
        searchQueryEntered - accepts the searchQuery entered
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws IOException
        org.apache.lucene.queryparser.classic.ParseException - ParseException thrown to caller

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws documentRetrieval.InvalidInputException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Entry Point calls the searcher and indexCreator Methods
        Parameters:
        args - String array used as a Store for Runtine Arguments
        Throws:
        documentRetrieval.InvalidInputException - custom Method setRankingScheme might throw this exception
        java.io.IOException - indexDirectoryCheck method might throw this Exception
